definition: a promise worth one thousand in gold (idiom); a promise that must be kept
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to consent/to promise/(literary) yes!
see 鞦韆|秋千[qiu1 qian1]
thousand
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Jinjiufu keeps its promise of faith and is as sincere as gold to its partners.
sentences.chinese: 金九福对信誉一诺千金，对客户及合作伙伴赤诚如金。

sentences.english: The ancient has a promise that can be counted on view , this view is very correct.
sentences.chinese: 古人有一诺千金的说法，这说法是很准确的。

sentences.english: Uli lieutenant answered as well as gold.
sentences.chinese: 乌利中尉一诺千金地回答。

sentences.english: Do prior life, the most precious is as good as gold.
sentences.chinese: 做事先做人，最珍贵的莫过一诺千金。

sentences.english: What he promised us is but a lip-service.
sentences.chinese: 他对我们的许诺不过是个一诺千金而已。

sentences.english: As good as gold will allow you to make many friends.
sentences.chinese: 一诺千金会让你交到很多朋友。

definition: a promise worth one thousand in gold (idiom); a promise that must be kept
to speak and keep one's promise (idiom); as good as one's word
lit. once said, a team of horses cannot unsay it (idiom); a promise must be kept
pinyin: yi1 yan2 ji4 chu1 , si4 ma3 nan2 zhui1

definition: one word worth nine sacred tripods (idiom); words of enormous weight
a nobleman's word is his bond (proverb)
pinyin: jun1 zi3 yi1 yan2 , si4 ma3 nan2 zhui1

definition: to abide by/to keep (promises etc)
to go back on one's word/to break one's promise/to be unfaithful/to be untrustworthy
to keep promises
supremely honorable and righteous
affable and even-tempered
benevolence and righteousness
open and candid (idiom); straightforward and upright
affection/comradeship

Xinyi or Hsinyi district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Xinyi or Hsini district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Xinyi or Hsini township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
good faith/honor/trust and justice
one must be a man of his word and resolute in his work (proverb)
pinyin: yan2 bi4 xin4 , xing2 bi4 guo3

definition: affectionate and true/loyal (idiom)
(idiom) one's actions are in keeping with what one says
